credit_line: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
title: Vase
medium: hard-paste porcelain with overglaze decoration in colors and gilding
description: circular, with slightly flaring sides; neck of scotia profile with twisted vertical fluting - sides pink, with two bisque medallions bearing head of bearded man dressed in style of early 17th century - drapery swags in yellow between medallions
name: Vase
